ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all: Can anyone confirm that (in theory) the Heritrix crawl.log file can be entirely reproduced from the ARC files generated by a successful crawl? And to

Subject: Question about ARC files and Heritrix logs
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=235746949

Hi all:

Can anyone confirm that (in theory) the Heritrix crawl.log file ca=
n be entirely reproduced from the ARC files generated by a successful crawl=
?

And to take this a little further, I think the same is probably true of =

  crawl.log
  progress-statistics.log
  uri-errors.log
but not of
   local=
-errors.log
   runtime-errors.log

Of the reports, I think the following ar=
e  reproducible from the ARC files generated by a successful crawl:
  crawl=
-report.txt (excpt the crawl name)
  hosts-report.txt
  seeds-report.txt
  =
responsecode-report.txt
but not
  frontier-report.txt (?)
  processors-repo=
rt.txt
  mimetype-report.txt


Can anyone confirm/deny?

Gordon
